content: Hi! is the meeting schedule/calendar available somewhere? I'd like to attend

The next meeting is on 2022-03-21T17:00:00+01:00 (For people in the US time zone: the usual meeting time might be off by an hour due to DST de-sync.)

If you want to be invited regularly, we also have a google calendar event. If you send me your email I can invite you to that, if you want.
